summary: The 24th annual Symposium on Computer Animation (SCA) will be held in Vancouver, Canada, from August 8 to August 10, 2025. SCA is the premier forum for innovations in the software and technology of computer animation. It brings together researchers and practitioners working on all aspects of time-based phenomena. The conference features a single-track program and emphasizes community interaction, making it an ideal venue for exchanging research results and fostering collaborations. The event invites submissions of original, high-quality papers and posters on computer animation, with accepted full papers published in the journal *Proceedings of the ACM in Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques (PACMCGIT)*.
callForPapers:
# Call for Papers

We invite submissions of original, high-quality papers and posters on computer animation, broadly defined as computation dealing with time-varying phenomena. Accepted full papers will be published in the journal *Proceedings of the ACM in Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques (PACMCGIT)*. Best Paper Awards will be given to excellent submissions that push the leading edge. Please refer to our [call-for-paper](instructions.html) page for paper submission information.

## Topics of Interest

The conference focuses on innovations in the software and technology of computer animation. It unites researchers and practitioners working on all aspects of time-based phenomena.

## Important Dates

1.  **Submission deadline (papers):** April 7, 2025 (23:59 Anywhere on Earth)
2.  **Submission deadline (posters):** June 15, 2025 (23:59 AoE)
3.  **Notification of acceptance:** May 12 2025
4.  **Revised version deadline:** June 12, 2025 (23:59 AoE)
5.  **Journal and poster notification:** June 30, 2025
6.  **Camera-ready deadline:** July 10, 2025 (23:59 AoE)

## Submission Guidelines

Please refer to the [Author Instructions](instructions.html) page for detailed submission guidelines, including formatting requirements and submission system details.

## Submission Types

*   **Papers:** Full papers will be published in the journal *Proceedings of the ACM in Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques (PACMCGIT)*.
*   **Posters:** Details to be announced.

## Contact Information

For any questions, please refer to the conference website for contact information.

title: ACM SIGMOBILE International Conference on Mobile Systems, Applications and Services

location: Anaheim, California, US
year: 2025
topics: Mobile Computing, Wireless Systems, Mobile Applications, Mobile Services
summary: ACM MobiSys 2025, the 23rd ACM International Conference on Mobile Systems, Applications, and Services, will be held in Anaheim, California, US, from June 23rd to 27th, 2025. The conference focuses on innovative research in mobile computing, wireless systems, and related applications, and is sponsored by ACM SIGMOBILE. Key dates include a paper submission deadline of December 9th, 2024, and early registration due on May 23rd, 2025. MobiSys 2025 invites submissions covering various areas such as mobile networking, systems, applications, security, and IoT.
callForPapers:
# Call for Papers

The 23rd ACM International Conference on Mobile Systems, Applications, and Services (MobiSys 2025) invites submissions presenting innovative and significant research on the design, implementation, usage, and evaluation of mobile computing and wireless systems, applications, and services. The conference is sponsored by ACM SIGMOBILE and will be held in Anaheim, California, US, from June 23rd to 27th, 2025.

## Topics of Interest

MobiSys 2025 welcomes submissions on a wide range of topics, including but not limited to:

*   Mobile and wireless networking
*   Mobile systems and operating systems
*   Mobile applications and services
*   Mobile sensing and context-awareness
*   Mobile security and privacy
*   Edge and cloud computing for mobile systems
*   Internet of Things (IoT) and mobile devices
*   Wearable computing
*   Human-computer interaction for mobile devices
*   Location-based services
*   Mobile data analytics
*   Systems and applications for augmented and virtual reality
*   Systems for autonomous vehicles

## Important Dates

*   **Abstract Registration:** December 2nd, 2024 23:59 AoE
*   **Paper Submission:** December 9th, 2024 23:59 AoE
*   **Early Rejection Notification:** January 20th, 2025
*   **Rebuttal Period:** February 13th - 17th, 2025
*   **Final Decision Notification:** March 7th, 2025
*   **Artifact Submission:** March 23rd, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **Poster/Demo/Rising Stars Submission:** April 11th, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **Workshop Submission:** April 19th, 2025
*   **Student Volunteer Submission Deadline:** April 30th, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **Student Travel Grant Submission:** May 15th, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **N2Women Poster Submission:** May 18th, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **N2Women Travel Grant Submission:** May 18th, 2025 23:59 AoE
*   **Early Registration Due:** May 23rd, 2025 23:59 PDT
*   **Standard Registration Due:** June 16th, 2025 23:59 PDT
*   **Main Conference:** June 23th - 27th, 2025

## Submission Guidelines

*   Submissions should be original and not previously published or under review elsewhere.
*   All submissions must be in PDF format.
*   Authors are encouraged to use the ACM conference format.
*   Details about the submission process, including the submission link, can be found on the conference website.
*   All submissions will be peer-reviewed by the Program Committee.

## Registration Fees

Registration details are available on the conference website:  [Registration](https://www.example.com/registration)

## Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact the conference organizers via the contact information provided on the conference website.
